casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Ryan Gabriel GARCELL. No. 465A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 5, 2006. Ann Marie Gomez, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Garcell. *573Charlie C. Walker, Asheville, Jeff Hunt, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of September 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time to Produce Transcript:

"Motion Allowed. Court reporter shall have up to and including the 2nd day of October 2006 to prepare and deliver transcript to counsel. By order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of September 2006."
